events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to return it for a full refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to an incorrect item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle your refund request regarding the wrong item.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with the refund, please upload a photo of the item you received and the packing slip.
Here are the pictures of the item I got along with the packing slip as requested for processing.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund and send you a prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the smooth refund process so far.
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please return the item at your earliest convenience.
We are checking in to ensure you received the return label and to see if you need further assistance with the refund.
Yes, I received the return label and sent the package back yesterday. Thank you for following up!
Your refund case has been closed successfully after verifying the return. Thank you for your cooperation.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Please let us know how we did with your refund process.
